title: Chinafy Experience Breakfast: Brisbane
presenterName: Adam Cogan, Lindsay Corfield, and Alvin Shen
eventShortDescription: ​China is a booming market and now is the time to take advantage of this growing user base. If you have a successful application that you would like to bring to the Chinese market, then working with SSW can help streamline your entry into this market. Join us to learn more about our Chinafy services from our team of experts.​
eventDescription:
​China is a booming market and now is the time to take advantage of this growing user base. If you have a successful application that you would like to bring to the Chinese market, then working with SSW can help streamline your entry into this market. Join us to learn more about our Chinafy services from our team of experts.

SSW has had an ongoing presence within the Chinese market for the last 10 years. We currently have two offices, one in Beijing, and a recently opened office in Hangzhou. Both of these offices allow us to have a strong insight into the current workings of the Chinese marketplace and how best to take your application to market.

This morning event will include a presentation from SSW's Chief Architect, Adam Cogan, Alvin Shen SSW China CEO, and GM International, Lindsay Corfield, on how SSW how can assist your transition into this market.

This presentation will then be followed by a delicious breakfast and a chance for you to ask our team any burning questions you may have.
description:
​

China is a booming market and now is the time to take advantage of this growing user base. If you have a successful application that you would like to bring to the Chinese market, then working with SSW can help streamline your entry into this market. Join us to learn more about our Chinafy services from our team of experts.
